name: The Devil and Some Aliens Went down to Georgia
name_original: The Devil and Some Aliens Went down to Georgia
description:
Controls:

Player movement: Arrow keys or W-A-S-D

Aiming:  Put your mouse cursor where you want to aim

Shooting: Left mouse button

Top-down shooter where you make pacts with the devil for better gear. Defend your self from waves of enemies by shooting them down. The devil has gone down to Georgia and he brought some alien friends with him. Make bets with the devil. In exchange  for your soul the devil will offer you better gear to fight off the aliens. Are you willing to wager  your soul for a leg up? 

This game was built as an entry into Ludum Dare 44 Game Jam - Compo. It was built in under 48 hours with all code, art, sound, and music created in that time-frame.
